topic.title: Transfer Procedure: External Plus Internal Permissive Signals

body.p: The PDU can be also be configured with a two-stage permissive signal ():
Stage 1. An external permissive signal (120V or dry‚Äêcontact signal) enables or disables the internal permissive signal to the SKRU key release signal via the Color Monitor.
Stage 2, internal permissive signal. The PDU checks sources for synchronization. The operator uses the Color Monitor Sync Screen to release the SKRU key. Use procedure described in .

fig.title: Two-Stage Permissive Signal: External plus Internal
